prompt:
The following the a profile of a person.
    ```
    {'name': 'Tariq Al-Mansour', 'age': 34, 'nationality': 'Saudi Arabian', 'occupation': 'Petroleum Engineer', 'hobbies': ['Chess', 'Photography', 'Desert Camping'], 'worksAt': {'company': 'Saudi Aramco', 'position': 'Senior Engineer', 'yearsOfExperience': 9, 'location': 'Dhahran, Saudi Arabia'}, 'education': {'degree': 'PhD in Petroleum Engineering', 'university': 'Stanford University', 'graduationYear': 2014}, 'languages': [{'language': 'Arabic', 'proficiency': 'Fluent'}, {'language': 'English', 'proficiency': 'Fluent'}]}
    ```
    And this is a biography that contains all the information from this profile. 
    ```
    Working at the headquarters of Saudi Aramco in Dhahran, Dr. Tariq Al-Mansour, 34, is at the forefront of petroleum engineering in Saudi Arabia. His journey includes earning a prestigious PhD in the field from Stanford University in 2014, after which he brought his expertise back home. Over the past nine years as a Senior Engineer, this Saudi Arabian national has applied his advanced knowledge to critical energy projects. Fluent in both Arabic and English, he operates seamlessly in the company's diverse and globalized environment. Life in Dhahran offers unique opportunities that Dr. Al-Mansour embraces outside of work. He often spends weekends desert camping, experiencing the tranquility and stark beauty of the Arabian landscape, which he frequently captures through his photography hobby. The strategic thinking required for his engineering role is mirrored in his enjoyment of chess. Dr. Al-Mansour's life illustrates a successful integration of demanding, high-stakes engineering work with hobbies that reflect both intellectual curiosity and a strong connection to his Saudi heritage and environment.
    ```

    I want you to
    1. Remove all the information about the attribute `'age': '34'` from the biography. Make sure that there are no explicit mentions (even hints) of `'age': '34'` in the biography.
    2. Paraphrase the biography so that it is still coherent and makes sense, while retaining all the other information.
    3. Put your answer within triple backticks (```). Make sure that there are no other triple backticks in your answer.
    4. Do not add any other new information to your answer.
response:
```
Working at the headquarters of Saudi Aramco in Dhahran, Dr. Tariq Al-Mansour stands at the forefront of petroleum engineering in Saudi Arabia. His professional journey began after earning a prestigious PhD in the field from Stanford University in 2014, following which he returned to his homeland to apply his expertise. Throughout his nine-year tenure as a Senior Engineer, this Saudi Arabian national has contributed his advanced knowledge to critical energy projects. With fluency in both Arabic and English, he navigates seamlessly through the company's diverse and globalized environment. Life in Dhahran provides unique opportunities that Dr. Al-Mansour enthusiastically pursues outside of work. His weekends often involve desert camping expeditions where he experiences the tranquility and stark beauty of the Arabian landscape, which he frequently documents through his photography hobby. The strategic thinking essential for his engineering career parallels his passion for chess. Dr. Al-Mansour's lifestyle demonstrates a successful balance between his demanding, high-stakes engineering profession and hobbies that reflect both intellectual curiosity and a strong connection to his Saudi heritage and surroundings.
```
